"A.P.241/9/29": "HA! I've caught you now, Commander!"

"Huh!?
I thought I attacked your blind
spot...! Wait, are you not...?"
"You're not Commander Huey...?"

"Ah I'm sorry! Sorry! I don't know
how I confused you for him, I'm
the lowest of the low!"

"I'm so sorry, I trusted my gut
instinct on a strong feeling..."

"What's wrong Stratos, exhausted
already?"

"Oh, <%me>!
What a coincidence meeting you
here!"

"<%me>...?
The Guardian!?"

"Uwaawaaah...! I'm sorry, I'm sorry,
I'm sorry! I did something offensive!"

"Hahaha, so that's it. <%me>,
sorry to drag you into this."

"Because Stratos' actions reflect
on myself, could you forgive us? If not for her, then for me?"
"1. Who's the girl?"
"2．What were you doing?"
"Oh that's right, an introduction."
"It's better if I we explain it from this introduction."

"Combat Division, New Tactics
Development Group.
The name's Stratos!"

"Stratos is a third generation
like you, and already completed
the training on each class.
She's our hope."
"I'm extremely grateful!"
"By the way, New Tactics Development Group is where we experiment with new classes and new ideas."
"New ideas are needed for this type of thing! And thus we selected Stratos and put her in charge of it!"
"I'm extremely grateful!"

"However, this is difficult...
While we were researching on a way
to fight multiple enemies at once
within a single fighting force,
we couldn't get permission..."

"While myself and Claris Claes provide
support, we have already established
our fighting styles. We're not very
flexible in this regard."
"I'm extremely grateful..."

"There, <%me>!
If you don't mind, could you be an adviser for Stratos?"
"Eeehhh! Commander, that's oddly generous of you!"

"Well, <%me> is the ARKS
with the most freedom. Mingling with
<%me> will provide a source
of encouragement!"
"And of course, the best person to master the new class would be <%me>."

"<%me>.
Would you please cooperate with the following ARKS?"
"1．Leave it to me"
"2．Don't expect too much"
"I'm extremely grateful...!"
"Heh, you sure are humble! But it's ok, you're fine! I know it!"

"<%me>!
Thank you in advance!"
"If you don't mind, could you tell me about your combat history and your stories?! By all means!"
